website_summaries.verdict: For the price, there are better modem-router options available.
pros: Belkin's highly usable, extensive mobile web interface is class-leading, and its USB management software is polished
cons: 2.4GHz performance isn't great, there's only one status light and it has a frustrating web UI for desktop users

customer_reviews.title: Great router for Apple devices
customer_reviews.text: This router provides great and stable connection for iPhone 6, iPad Air 2, iPhone 5, Apple TVs and Roku boxes. Obviously iPhone 6 and iPad Air 2 take advantage of AC protocol which greatly improve speed and range of the connection (220 Mbps for iPhone and 380 Mbps for iPad on 5Ghz at distance of 15 meters) Rest of the N devices like Roku boxes, Apple TVs and my MacBook Pro Retina 2012 and MacBook Air 2011 perform the same as before. Router offers great parental controls and filters against malicious web sites.
customer_reviews.author: IK77

customer_reviews.title: love it working great
customer_reviews.text: love it working great .i like the website where I can set times to go on and off, and blocks on phones or computers. I like the open network, so people staying at our house can use it without a password, tho I will turn that feature off on occasion, but I decide.
customer_reviews.author: owesa

customer_reviews.title: Good Router, and Fast.  Only 2 Issues are:
customer_reviews.text: Good Router, and Fast. Only 2 Issues are: Cannot Add external IP addresses to Firewall to Block/Ban And for God Sake! Don't be an Idiot Like me, Properly Adjust or Disable the Intellistream Setting. Its Default is Enabled at a Slow Speed. I for Instance didn't see this setting for almost a Year, and was paying/wasting$$$ for 100mbs connection ($$$$) but only getting 15mbs. I thought It was my ISP but it was this router setting. This setting was my mistake so has No Bearing on the 4 Stars. 4 Stars is because the Firewall is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: ReplicasUSA

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, but not reliable for wireless printing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a N900 netgear router. I've had it a week and am returning it. My wireless printer (HP 6500 A-Plus) will not remain connected to the network. I have to go tell it to reconnect ever time I want to print, which is silly. I've had my netgear router for 2 years, and never once did I have any wireless printer problems.
customer_reviews.author: chrwhe

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an expensive and what I thought was nice Linksys, but after many visits from my cable company, they told me that modem was causing my problems. I hooked up my old 750 Belkin, and no problems. Since I have a large house, wanted to have a really GOOD one. This done works like the 750 I previously had. Not sure I needed to spend more money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: suz4601

customer_reviews.title: works good most of the time disconnects from any computer that ...
customer_reviews.text: works good most of the time disconnects from any computer that goes to sleep and takes 1 to 2 minutes reconnect have talked to Belkin once they were very helpful and tried a few things still is the same haven't had time to get back to them will try again at another time
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Both this refurb and the Belkin AC 1750 I already had in use quit working within two weeks of each other. I suspect an internal coin battery died since both were manufactured in 2012 according to the Belkin website. Autopsy to follow!
customer_reviews.author: david l west

customer_reviews.title: Belkin Router
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I have a wireless router with great range. I connect an external hard disk drive to it, and I can access my music with my Android phone. In addition, I hooked up my HP Laserjet printer to the router via ethernet cable. Using the HP Print app for Android, I quickly found the printer with my phone and easily printed a document.
customer_reviews.author: JP Georgia

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made, short life
customer_reviews.text: I've had two now that lasted less than two years. I think it's cheaply made. Maybe ok if you get a great price and you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: imaFox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great even with five electronics running on WiFi at.once.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very good router. It has bugs and I believe in their attempt to make it flashy, they lost quality. Highly recommend using different router such as the CISCO Linksys E2500 or newer router. They are first class routers.
customer_reviews.author: feisal

customer_reviews.title: cable guy said this is what i need for high ...
customer_reviews.text: cable guy said this is what i need for high speed... bought a brand new iMac, speed significantly faster, however, it goes out more frequently (every other day or so)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Williams

customer_reviews.title: dont waste time and money for this router
customer_reviews.text: my first official router but i wish it could have been better router then this and now im trying to return it and the "return Policy is closed" it keeps disconnecting from my modem wish i could get it replaced or get a refund and get another phone. NEVER DEALING WITH BELKIN AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Belkin products - strong signal, maintenance free, modest price.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Service area a bit limited
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as expected but the service area is a bit limited. Very week across the house. Other than that it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Olson

customer_reviews.title: Best Range
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged it in and it just about set itself up. It has the best range I have ever had. Returned a top of the line $275 router different brand that service people could not get running.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: For a multi device household it is a must. The wait time is very minimal for streaming, no interrupted downloading on pcs, just device enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: whitelace1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, does the job, secure password, and has the lastest technology for wireless connection
customer_reviews.author: booboobear

customer_reviews.title: Maybe even better.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this router for a few months now and it seems to work as well as my old previous Belkin that died after 7 years. Maybe even better.
customer_reviews.author: Mzfreckleface

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Have had problems with WiFi in our home. This one did the job!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. highly ree!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! Performs BETTER THAN promised. No issues setting up. Easy as can be. I recommend this to anyone who wants top notch product and access.
customer_reviews.author: Ross R.

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous item came as described NIB perfect condition works great love it! A++ Seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect---item worked flawlessly---quicker tan our older router--great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and powerful. Sets up in a couple of minutes. Clear easy instructions because it's an automatic setup. You just have to connect to your service provider to complete. Enter your password on your computer and any other devices that use your network and you're done!
customer_reviews.author: Neffig

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: works well. but I occasionally could not connect to it until I rebooted it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Paschke

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very big house in a rural area . And this belkin ac 1750 DB Wi FI dual-band. AC + gigabit works great .I would recommend this to anyone who has a big house. Or lives in a rural area. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the new version of the belkin router I had previously. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: DanaD

customer_reviews.title: I am very dissaointed with Belkin AC1750 router. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissaointed with Belkin AC1750 router. It stoped working just in the week. I restart it, reset it. It didn't work. After a couple days it start work. But it stuck from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not getting speeds advertised as i am getting only around 850 on the 5 band.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but then would not connect to internet
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but then would not connect to internet. My old router would and the Belkin did also after I plugged it into my old router. I returned and got a different router much like this one. Surprise, it also would not connect to the internet until I switched to "Static IP Address". The Belkin does not have this selection. The static IP ended in 251 and dynamic came up ending in 150. Too bad Belkin does not have this. Otherwise, a very nice router.
customer_reviews.author: D Boone

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product - stops working after several months.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this router. It seemed to work fine at first, but then after several months, this router stopped working properly. It was constantly requiring reset to get the WiFi working again. Then I read other consumer reviews on Amazon complaining about the same thing. Finally I gave up on it and went with a rental WiFi router from Internet service provider and I haven't had any problems since. I wouldn't recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne G

customer_reviews.title: Not plug and play as expected
customer_reviews.text: Although in new condition as advertised, the router turned out to be over two years old and thus out of the window for Belkin's free customer service. The pre-programmed password doesn't work, and we have had difficulty learning how to set a new one. We have also had a lot of trouble getting it to recognize the internet signal from our ISP, and in fact after a week we don't have it up and running yet. That said, its signal is in fact registering as nice and strong throughout the house, much better than our five-year old router, just as we had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Goldberger

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: One thing that I would like to mention is that if you are using this with AT&T uverse, you will need to use there gateway as the modem. This is if you are getting your service through the phone line. Router works great for the price. Comes with the 1 2.0 USB and 1 3.0 USB ports so that you can connect a printer and external hard drive. Very easy setup as well. Built in software did all the work.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: After several calls, going back and forth between my internet service provider and Belkin support, I was finally told that the product was defective and should be returned. I know this probably isn't common, but very frustrating. Because of all the hassle I went through I decided to get my money back and order an Apple Airport Extreme instead of getting a replacement from Belkin.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny A

customer_reviews.title: buy the basic BELKIN
customer_reviews.text: it would not work, something was wrong, no one could get it to work for me
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this
customer_reviews.text: I am not big on writing review. However, this product is so horrible, I couldn't stop myself. I got this in December 2013 and since then connection has dropped every day. I called up Amazon and then gladly replaced the item. Second router had the same issue. Given, I have too much dependence on wifi (thermostat, Apple TV, ipads, reciever, etc.) I am returning this item. Amazon was awesome as usual and now I am getting Time Capsule and keeping my fingers crossed. The only good thing - range is great when it works.
customer_reviews.author: honest buyer

customer_reviews.title: i like it but I am loosing 2
customer_reviews.text: i like it but I am loosing 2.4 band for some reason and 5 band doesn't have long range as 2,4
customer_reviews.author: OMAR GUTIERREZ,

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommed this manufacturers products
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a great favor and buy NetGear! Belkin was nothing but trouble, took an act of god to replace the faulty router (and 6 hours (yes 6 hours) on the telephone over 2 days. Bought NetGear and haven't looked back (a lengthy netgear review was posted explaining the operational differences).
customer_reviews.author: FunkyC.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Like it said, quick and easy to install. Instructions are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Service interruptions are very common
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it is an OK wifi router. We have a large house and signal is decent everywhere. I especially like the router's parental controls that allow you to block inappropriate/malicious content. Unfortunately the router goes off line several times per week (sometimes several times per day), requiring me to power down and restart. This drives the family nuts. They gleefully remind me that trying to save a few bucks once again backfires (price was amazingly low- now I know why).
customer_reviews.author: Rocko

customer_reviews.title: i had the old router for over 10 years without ...
customer_reviews.text: i had the old router for over 10 years without any issue. the new one i have to reset every week.
customer_reviews.author: Khai T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 story home greater reception over a 5 year old Belkin product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Router to buy when you need to buy a Router. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Don Seavey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returning item because when I opened the box it was a lynkys router inside now a belkin
customer_reviews.author: Ks

product_meta.title: Belkin AC1000 Dual Band Wireless AC Router + Gigabit (Latest Generation)
product_meta.description:
Style:AC 1000The Belkin AC 1000 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router is next-generation Wi-Fi for reliable connectivity and improved speed - up to 2x the current standard. Now it's easy for the whole family to access online content with multiple wireless devices at the same time from anywhere in your home. The Belkin AC 1000 also improves device performance and works seamlessly with wireless 'N' and 'G' devices. Get the most out of all your wireless devices and take home networking to the next level with the Belkin AC 1000.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Belkin AC 1000 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router is next-generation Wi-Fi for reliable connectivity and improved speed - up to 2x the current standard. Now it's easy for the whole family to access online content with multiple wireless devices at the same time from anywhere in your home. The Belkin AC 1000 also improves device performance and works seamlessly with wireless 'N' and 'G' devices. Get the most out of all your wireless devices and take home networking to the next level with the Belkin AC 1000.

See more
feature_bullets: Up to 2X faster than N Technology
New level of reliability and coverage
Up to 2X faster than N Technology
